attributes.action: Levy a windfall tax on major corporations to contribute to the cost of flood damage
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The British people support, through their labour, the creation of vast profits by banks, building societies, food retailers etc. These should now stand up and create a fund that contributes to the cost flood damage nationwide. Failing voluntary action the PM should instigate a statutory  windfall tax to make this happen.
